agentSpans.name: multiple_tools_agent

input.content: You are a helpful assistant with access to weather and time tools. When asked about weather, use the get_weather tool. When asked about time, use the get_time tool. Be concise in your responses.
Use the get_weather tool exactly once to get the weather in Tokyo.

agentSpans.output: The current weather in Tokyo is sunny with a temperature of 72°F.

name: pydanticai-multiple-tools-weather

input.content: You are a helpful assistant with access to weather and time tools. When asked about weather, use the get_weather tool. When asked about time, use the get_time tool. Be concise in your responses.
Use the get_weather tool exactly once to get the weather in Tokyo.

output: The current weather in Tokyo is sunny with a temperature of 72°F.
